meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Development Plans
agenda_items.description: An application for a development plan on property zoned Planned Development District No. 1012, on the west line of Stemmons Freeway Service Road, north of Viceroy Drive.

agenda_items.title: Specific Use Permit for Private Recreation Center
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for a private recreation center, club, or area on property zoned an R-7.5(A) Single Family District.

agenda_items.title: Amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2071
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2071 for a detached non-premise sign (billboard).

agenda_items.title: Specific Use Permit for Commercial Motor Vehicle Parking
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for commercial motor vehicle parking on property zoned an LI Light Industrial District.

agenda_items.title: Amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 1393
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 1393 for a private school.

agenda_items.title: Specific Use Permit for Vehicle Display
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for vehicle display, sales, and service.

agenda_items.title: Amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2076
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to an expansion of Specific Use Permit No. 2076 for an inside commercial amusement.

agenda_items.title: Amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2211
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2211 for a bar, lounge, or tavern.

agenda_items.title: Development Code Amendment
agenda_items.description: Consideration of amending Chapters 51 and 51A, the Dallas Development Code.

agenda_items.title: Development Code Amendment - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: Consideration of amending Chapter 51A, the Dallas Development Code.

agenda_items.title: Creation of The Frontier Subdistrict
agenda_items.description: An application to create 'The Frontier Subdistrict' within the Downtown Special Provision Sign District.

agenda_items.title: Subdivision Cases - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application to create one 55.296-acre lot from a tract of land.
